attributes.action: Ban the use of Flash Photography in Exotic Reptile Houses in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many of the General public and professional photographers have no IDEA of the potential Damage they are causing to the Reptiles using flash photography just centimetres away from their Eyes through the glass of their cage. At large Attractions in the U.K this can happen a thousand times a day to one individual Reptile.
this can not be Beneficial to their Welfare.
in fact we would not be surprised if many of these reptiles are already suffering from some sort of blindness or in fact are already totally blind.
